snippet: The fiscal impasse in Congress has been testing investors’ confidence in the United States. | Janet L. Yellen, President Obama’s nominee to lead the Fed, has pressed for stronger measures to reduce unemployment. | Meredith A. Whitney appears...
abstract: The fiscal impasse in Congress has been testing investors’ confidence in the United States. | Janet L. Yellen, President Obama’s nominee to lead the Fed, has pressed for stronger measures to reduce unemployment. | Meredith A. Whitney appears poised to leave the research and brokerage industry.

headline.main: Faith in U.S. Debt Is Rattled
